name: Button Press Feedback
description: Subtle scale down on press (0.98) that provides tactile feedback. Hover includes slight scale up (1.02) and brightness increase. Uses Linear's standard easing curve.
whenToUse: Any clickable element that needs immediate feedback

css.transition: border, background-color, color, box-shadow, opacity, filter, transform 160ms cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94)

accessibility.reducedMotion: Remove scale animation, keep focus/active states for visual feedback
accessibility.focusVisible: Add focus ring with offset for keyboard navigation

subtle.description: Even more subtle for secondary actions
